intro: Cuncea, commonly known as the common cuncea, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its finely divided, fern-like leaves and small, clustered white or yellowish flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. It is often found in temperate regions across Europe and parts of Asia. Cuncea is known for its aromatic properties and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
